body_html:
@gemmell: I would also like to do this in the near future. This is the "best" reference I have found so far: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/41070330/is-it-possible-to-use-tensorflow-c-api-on-windows/41071296#41071296

It would be useful to have a more detailed and precise one.
